Articles.Content:
After the unfortunate incident over a snickers bar, KSC cleanup crews were called in to scrape the remains of poor Bob Kerman off the runway. Now, His third cousin's boyfriends Aunts Nephew's ex girlfriends son has taken the third spot on the flight crew. After the shocking discovery of Bob's will, Wilsel Kerman has reported for duty in the top secret blimp testing program.

(I forget how I did this, No file editing though.)

Edit: I just realized you can barely read it.
When you use at first a one kerbal pod and then the one with three places. In the first one is bill and in the secnd is Jeb, bob and a new one.

I think I may have EVA'd Bob, ended the flight, and launched again?

Huh, It's still pretty funny though
once I deleted quicksave and had 2 jebs land on the mun.
